author: parithosh
content:
`mainnet-shadow-fork-2` configs are out and can be found here: https://github.com/eth-clients/merge-testnets/tree/main/mainnet-shadow-fork-2

If you have a mainnet node already synced, you can just start it up with the new config (geth/erigon need a re-init - but no resync needed!). 

Tooling links:
https://beaconchain.mainnetshadowfork2.ethdevops.io/
https://explorer.mainnetshadowfork2.ethdevops.io/
https://ethstats.mainnetshadowfork2.ethdevops.io/

TTD should be hit 23rd of April @ ~10AM CEST. We'd most likely be overriding TTD tomorrow to make sure we are on time.
